item.title: UGC Script for Bradford (Mom with Dementia in Memory Care Facility) - Upwork
item.description:
Create a UGC script for the creator (and Kahn's friend) Bradford. Please include a shot list too for Bradford. This video could be anywhere from 1 min to 3 min in final form.

He has JubileeTV installed at his mom's room in a Memory Care Senior Living facility (not sure how they refer to it exactly).

Bradford primarily uses "Telescope" feature where he controls his mom's TV remotely but if "Passive Mode" (doc below) seems relevant, try to incorporate it too. Video calling can also be included re Cognitive decline is common among socially isolated seniors: https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC7274632/

Here are resources:
Bradford's IG: https://www.instagram.com/rahmstagram/ (he has a bunch of dementia/mom-related content already; we can use it or the general plot points for your video).

Note: he's involved with the memorycare community (his job); https://www.caringkindnyc.org/ (we should mention it)

All this footage is available:
https://www.instagram.com/p/C3Sl_ObM6ak/

JTV reviews about parents who have dementia:
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1J44V1xDpSu7dyBsK4udt1Fn0sdtTxJfNO0_845n_T_c/edit?usp=sharing

Passive Mode brief:
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1eAPgiIXA99Vw1ZEyj5gAVOUXE4xYuyopuIZQ_2Eqbfg/edit?usp=sharing

UGC inspo:
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1SnauDuhsvamdAKypxWAd--fZ2ELTWo8Mgd338jlIrHk/edit?usp=sharing

Budget: $50
Posted On: June 28, 2024 22:38 UTC
Category: Scriptwriting
Skills:Creative Writing
Skills: Creative Writing
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
